chapters.title: Chapter 2: Whirlpools in the Pattern
chapters.info: Bain, p. 55 (39)—Maiden of the Spear of the Black Rock sept of the Shaarad Aiel. She is first-sister to Chiad; they had to sneak through the other's camp to meet the Wise Ones and become first-sisters, since their clans were (and are) in blood feud. The two of them get along well with Faile. Bain has short, fiery hair that is slightly darker than Chiad's. See also Chiad.
